mapper.select: select role from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userId}

select a.user_code userCode, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_password userPassword, a.user_name userName, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.email email, a.id_card idCard, a.role role, b.invite_code inviteCode, a.version version from t_sys_user a LEFT JOIN t_customer b on a.user_code = b.user_code where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.role = 1
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and b.invite_code in (select invite_code from t_store where user_code = #{userId})
order by a.create_time desc
